website_summaries.verdict: A fan-favorite primer that everyone should have in their makeup bag.
pros: Smooths over dry, flaky patches so your foundation won’t cling to them
Primer glides on easily and dries quickly
Contains soothing vitamin E. Effectively locks makeup in place all day and stops it from settling into fine lines
cons: When product gets low, pump dispenser becomes less effective

customer_reviews.title: Old product!
customer_reviews.text: I shop on Amazon every week. This product is one of the worst products I have ever ordered from here. Don’t get me wrong, I love Bare Minerals primer, but this particular bottle and the bottle of brightener I ordered are, for a lack of better words, old. The product is so thick that it will not pump out of the bottle. I have to open the lid and scrape it out on my palm. I use Bare Minerals primer every morning, but my local shop closed and I was forced to order it from here. Never again!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It's intended to be used with the bare minerals loose powder or at least their products. It works great at smoothing and hydrating before I apply the makeup. I've used bare minerals mineral foundation for years and one problem I had was that no matter how much moisturizer I applied prior, sometimes I'd get dry spots after application or a few hours later. This helps so much! A little goes a long way. Highly recommend it for use with their other products. Wish you got more for your money, but otherwise it's wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: jlms

customer_reviews.title: The product seemed like it had been left on the shelf too long
customer_reviews.text: The product seemed like it had been left on the shelf too long. I've used this product for years but will go back to my original supplier so as to get fresher product. The bottle I had was very thick, I had to open the top & take a makeup stick to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly & Ivys Granna

customer_reviews.title: This primer is colorless and that's what I love most about it
customer_reviews.text: This primer is colorless and that's what I love most about it. After moisturizing I apply a thin layer on my entire face and follow with a little BB cream and/or concealer. I don't care for foundation and don't feel that I need it because the primer smooths my complexion very nicely. I might finish with a dusting of Bare Escentuals Mineral Veil.
customer_reviews.author: janegrace

customer_reviews.title: Feels like satin and keeps make-up in place!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many different primers -but keep coming back to this one. I hope they never change it! It goes on like satin and my make-up then glides over evenly. I find I use less foundation and have zero drag as I’m smoothing it over my face. It prevents make-up build-up in creases, and prevents shine throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Product itself is great, love how it feels going on
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is great, love how it feels going on, and keeps the powder from settling. However, the bottle I got, keeps separating, maybe it was an old batch or something, not sure. So I have to constantly open the bottle and try and stir it together again. Sadly, it didn't start happening until after my 30 day return window.
customer_reviews.author: Che Day

customer_reviews.title: Best primer I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: My foundation always becomes “blotchy/patchy” around nose and upper lip area. This is the only primer I’ve found that eliminates my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Prime your face before putting on your foundation
customer_reviews.text: Great to apply prior to foundation. The secret, wait about at least 5 mins to apply your foundation after this product. The result is significantly noticeable with and without this product. This product makes your face looks smoother. I use liquid foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation primer that works extremely well with rest of ...
customer_reviews.text: Always a dependable product from bareMinerals line. Great foundation primer that works extremely well with rest of makeup line, as well as other makeup / foundation product lines.
customer_reviews.author: Baseballmom326

customer_reviews.title: It makes putting on the base makeup (even liquid) easier, smother and evenly.
customer_reviews.text: It makes putting on the base makeup (even liquid) easier, smother and evenly.
customer_reviews.author: lynne

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a primer to start off my daily ritual. This services as a great starter to smooth out skin. No clumping or rubbing off.....would for sure buy again
customer_reviews.author: DLB

customer_reviews.title: fast delivery-great price
customer_reviews.text: I've tried lot's of primers but this one really works. It's easy to apply and gives very light & very effective coverage. I love Bare Minerals!
customer_reviews.author: rosebud

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bareminerals Primer is awesome! Good coverage, small bottle but lasts a long time. Helps powder not fill in lines and wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: didn’t fill pores
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this product but extremely disappointed. It didn’t fill in my pores but accentuated them as well as made me breakout. I thought that this brand would be good for sensitive skin that is sometimes dry as well as oily in different parts of the day but it made my makeup fall off, my skin breakout and my pores huge. I will be sticking to my little $8 jar of l’oréal primer.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Formula is a little different
customer_reviews.text: It APPEARS to be the exact same product but the formula is a little thinner than the Bare Minerals Prime Time I’ve normally purchased at a beauty supply store. It still spreads beautifully on my face so I guess I’m happy with it and would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jannyd

customer_reviews.title: Keeps makeup fresh
customer_reviews.text: Use it in the morning after applying moisturizer, before foundation. Keeps my make-up on all day. Can't feel any stickiness at all. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This primer makes a huge difference with my bare minerals powder foundation. My make up stays on all day and has a smother look when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2boys

customer_reviews.title: Super product.
customer_reviews.text: Provides a sheer finish to the face. It works alone (without foundation), provide a smooth clarity to the skin. Used beneath foundation, it makes it easier to apply less foundation. Overall, really helps if you seek a natural look. Great price for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Won't use any other primer
customer_reviews.text: Love this and won't use any other primer under my foundation. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Motivated

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake!! Do not buy. I could tell immediately after opening that it wasn’t an actual bare minerals product.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Use this every day and it helps the makeup go on smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Love Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Feels great on my skin and smooths out my makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Moore

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Prime Original which should be clear, just as the picture in the reviews section. It was tinted, like the Prime Brightening.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, however this item did not feel like the bare minerals primer that I have bought from stores. This felt like a cheap knock off or an expired product. The pump did not work and the product was solid and not smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Good product, pump didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: The product is good and just like the tube I bought at a bare minerals outlet store. The problem is that I can't get the pump to work on the bottle so I have to unscrew the cap and scrape some out with my finger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wear it every day
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful under makeup. Keeps face fresh looking longer.
customer_reviews.author: margaret smith

customer_reviews.title: Big waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Went to use this product for the first time this weekend, and it's all dried up. Big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Alice J. Rostad

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn’t really have a scent. It takes very little product for complete coverage and my foundation last all day.
customer_reviews.author: GrandW

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this primer! Have used it for yrs! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jason E.

customer_reviews.title: A must for air brush makeup. Never use anything else.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for using under airbrush makeup. Makes great makeup look even better and stay on longer... Like for 24 hours! Love the way it feels on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Love this, it helps me with evening my skin tone!

customer_reviews.title: Fresh start
customer_reviews.text: Great feel, truly helps makeup stay on longer, helps smooth out my complexion!

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I haves used Bare Escentuals for years. This is a new addition to my daily make-up. I currently use a compact foundation and by using the primer find a more natural look. The primer also seems to keep my look fresh all day and with no creases in the wrinkles appearing in my 60 plus face!
customer_reviews.author: Love the stars

customer_reviews.title: Great for your skin Aswell as primer get compliments on my skin
customer_reviews.text: Feel In. Love soon as I purchased a year ago been loyal to it sense!!

customer_reviews.title: It's the excellent makeup primer I'm used to
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I expected. It's the excellent makeup primer I'm used to. I'm glad to be able to easily order it here.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Erickson

customer_reviews.title: is a perfect light makeup
customer_reviews.text: If you have acne, give it a try to this, is a perfect light makeup, it won't create you breakouts if you continue with discipline your beauty routine, remember always to wash the brush at least once a week. I recommend this product

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: I love how silky smooth this goes on and makes your face feel.

customer_reviews.text: This is pricey but it seems to work well and causes no breakouts or irritation on my oily skin

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for years, I like that I can order it from home

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this purchase. The primer worked for about 2 weeks and then would not come out of the pump. After opening it up, I realized that it had turned into a solid gel. I will never buy this product or from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived promptly and was as Described. Will definitely order again.

customer_reviews.title: It is the original
customer_reviews.text: This is the same product you’d get from bare minerals. I’m so happy I found this product.

customer_reviews.title: Love the cream hate the container
customer_reviews.text: The pumps never work so you have to get the cream out with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Sosa

customer_reviews.title: This is the best primer to put on before any face makeup
customer_reviews.text: This is the best primer to put on before any face makeup. It makes your face feel so so soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Pam L.

customer_reviews.title: Pump doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but on my first use the pump does not work. Very inconvenient!

customer_reviews.title: Great primer
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for several years and haven't found one better

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this primer! Smoothes your skin for a nice even foundation application. Just needs a minute to dry.

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, but I prefer the Smashbox primer. ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent product, but I prefer the Smashbox primer. I was hoping to find a more reasonably priced alternative, but I just don't think this one is as effective. On the plus side, it's not heavy and doesn't cause breakouts.

customer_reviews.title: Product thick like Vaseline
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years but this last bottle the formula was so thick it wouldnt even pump out the nozzle.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Love this primer!

customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for years and find that it does what it says it will do.

customer_reviews.title: WOULD RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. It makes your mineral makeup go on much smoother. I tried another brand but did not like it as well.

customer_reviews.text: Leaves your face super smooth - it is a great way to apply your makeup (after any cream you put in you face/before the makeup)

customer_reviews.text: My makeup goes on evenly when I use prime time. It really helps with my combination skin (dry/oily.)

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Primer
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and find it is always cheaper on Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong...This stuff is sooooo Sheer!

customer_reviews.title: SO SMOOTH
customer_reviews.text: Applies so smoothly, could even possibly use as just a moisturizer.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I use it daily before applying my makeup.

customer_reviews.title: My Goto Primer
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel of this primer and has really helped smooth out my foundation and reduce any foundation caking or separation.
customer_reviews.author: Christine J.

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product; however, lately it seems like I get through 2/3 of the bottle and the pump doesn't get the rest of the product out of the bottle. I end up turning it over, unscrewing the pump, and scraping out what I need daily.
customer_reviews.author: cher4sc

customer_reviews.title: Best primer I've used!
customer_reviews.text: I've used bare minerals for years and I LOVE this lightweight primer for my powder. It doesn't feel greasy and goes on super easily.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: First thing on my face after I wash it and start my makeup regimen.

customer_reviews.text: This primer is more watery than the other one I had. Same brand, it does not seem as silky.

customer_reviews.title: Great daily primer
customer_reviews.text: Goes on light and stays all day. Great daily primer.
customer_reviews.author: paula sparks

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what this does. I admit I've ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what this does. I admit I've never used primer before but this doesn't seem to do anything. I bought it to use under the bare minerals foundation powder and it doesn't seem to make a difference at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rissa Wins

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Did not keep makeup on any longer than cheap stuff from riteaid. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect with bare minerals makeup and really provides staying power!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Sapp

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product so far
customer_reviews.text: My makeup stayed on all day and feels creamy to apply. Very happy with the product so far!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Love the silky feeling!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite product I use! I LOVE the silky feeling it gives my skin when I apply it. And I also think it makes my make up last longer. I don't have to reapply my make up throughout the day. Once in the morning & good all day long!
customer_reviews.author: A Music

customer_reviews.title: Not worth a few pumps, only to find gummy chunks  stuck in the bottom!
customer_reviews.text: Only a half a bottle! The primer I received an only lasted a week. When you screw the top off you can see the gummy part stuck in the bottom. I don’t wear makeup everyday but this is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: melinda m.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth skin primer!
customer_reviews.text: This primer is a gel type liquid that makes your face smoother to apply makeup! I put it on top of my moisturizer and let it soak in for 15 minutes. Then apply makeup!
customer_reviews.author: darlene spiegel

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, weightless but not overly moisturizing.
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight, soaks right in and makes makeup smooth. I have an issue with dry spots on my face and was hoping this would help cover them. Unfortunately it does not, that's why I gave 4 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Beth

customer_reviews.title: This product works.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to make it easier to apply my make-up and it works. You don't need much to spread over your face, but don't wait too long to apply your make-up and it dries fairly quickly and you then lose the reason for using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prime Time - Smoothe as Silk
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. My skin feels like silk when I apply just a drop. My complexion looks smoothe with makeup as long as I always remember to use Prime Time by Bare Minerals first. Wish it came in a larger bottle though.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Best Primer!
customer_reviews.text: Best primer hands down! Keeps your makeup fresh & long wearing. I barely touch up during the day when i use this primer
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: i don't have any other primers to compare this to but this one seems to minimize my large pores for at least half the day. It goes on clear and it's not greasy. Foundation slides right on. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C. Dupree

customer_reviews.title: Huge skin texture improvement!
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at how smooth my face looked. Must let it dry before foundation application.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Just love it
customer_reviews.text: Best primer on the market. Just a little bit goes a long way. Non greasy. Perfect primer for dry makeup or liquid foundations. Great for dry or oliy skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I always use bare minerals and this primer definitely makes a difference! My make up stays on nicely and it is smooth going on

customer_reviews.title: Like liquid velvet
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. It is like putting silk in your face.

customer_reviews.title: One of my absolute favorite products. I found this on here a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually order this through senhor a and macys. One of my absolute favorite products. I found this on here a bit cheaper so i figured id save some money! What I received though was not the quality is know. This product was oily and left my skin greasy and itchy. I don't think it was the real product in the bottle. :( will only buy through sephora and macys..
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: It's not like what I'm used to buying
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is different from what is advertised. It seems runny and watered down. It's not like what I'm used to buying.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyanne E. Wharrie Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Vaseline in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used this product before and after one use never again. It comes out like Vaseline and doesnt really dry. It’s super silky and after two hours of wear my face is very oily. Wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great especially if you have oily skin.

customer_reviews.title: Helps your makeup glide on your face.
customer_reviews.text: Love this primer. It makes my face makeup go on so easily it is well worth the money and I think it keeps me from using more makeup than needed. I like this brand but have to say I haven’t tried others.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me

customer_reviews.title: It's a must!
customer_reviews.text: A must as a base for your make up. It helps even the look and extend the wear of your make up.

product_meta.title: bareMinerals Prime Time Original Face Primer, 1 Ounce
product_meta.description: bareMinerals Prime Time Original Face Primer, 1 Ounce
feature_bullets: Combats rough patches, flaky dryness, fine lines, excess oil, uneven texture and enlarged pores so that your foundation goes on flawlessly
Soothes and nourishes with plant extracts, antioxidants and vitamins c and e
Free of preservatives and irritants so that your skin feels great
Country of origin is United States

specifications.Manufacturer: Mainspring America, Inc. DBA Direct Cosmetics
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
